title: PBE ACCOUNT IS DISABLED
body:
Hello, guys why my account pbe is disabled ? username is **[REDACTED]** i dont rebember  
Within the game but the username to start the account is that

replies.body:
I had to remove your username because that's sensitive info that could be used to take your account. I definitely recommend against posting it publicly in the future, for the security of your account. I took a look at your account and it seems you'll need to write a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in so we can sort your account with you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
